Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The property has excellent visibility from I-26 and Tanger Outlet Boulevard.  Close proximity to Tanger Outlet Mall, Walmart, Sam’s Club, Charleston International Airport, Boeing South Carolina Campus, Center Pointe retail development and North Charleston Coliseum and Convention Center.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The property is +/- 5,089 SF plus a large covered patio and rooftop dining.  Restaurant situated on one acre of land with abundant parking at a prime location across from the Tanger Outlets in North Charleston. Open floor plan, several dining areas, large bar and kitchen.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
− Located on the main retail corridor in North Charleston with a signalized intersection 
and full visibility to Highway 17
− Immediate access to I-26 with traffic counts of 126,300 VPD

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
− Former HHGregg box located directly across from Target
− Sits on approximately 2.42 acres
− Zoning: B-2 (North Charleston)
− 112 surface lot parking spaces
− Building features 1 loading dock
− Area retailers include: Target, Northwoods Mall, Home Depot, Chipotle, Lowe’s, Old navy and more

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Former HH Gregg in North Charleston For Sale

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in Downtown Hartsville near Coker College, Sonoco Headquarters, Stingray Boats

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Former restaurant in Downtown Hartsville. 6,852 SF on 0.21 acres.

Restaurant includes dining area, bar and private party room. Existing equipment included with sale of property
9,840 SF building with showroom and warehouse on Two Notch Rd

The subject property is a +1.3 acre parcel located in downtown Lexington, SC. The site currently has a +5,191 SF multi-tenant retail building. With easy access to both Hwy 1 and Hwy 378 via Hagood St & Butler St, the site is an ideal redevelopment site for a convenience store, retailer, or restaurant. The existing site has ample parking with additional land in the area to allow for additional parking as-needed. The site is located in the heart of Lexington with excellent demographics

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: This parcel is located in the heart of the Drayton Mill Community across from Drayton Road form the Drayton Mill Market Place. It is a growing corridor convenient to high end retail and newly developed single family and multifamily communities.
